author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
🚨 China’s top economists are making jaw-dropping proposals, and we’re here to break them down.

In this video, we look at the most outrageous—and yes, real—ideas from Chinese economists that will have you questioning everything:

⛽ 10x Gas Tax – Want less traffic? Punish drivers with a massive tax hike.
👰 Reintroduce Concubines & Legalize Polygamy – Solving the marriage crisis by treating women like economic resources.
🏮 Legal Brothels to Lower Crime – Who needs laws when you have government-approved red-light districts?
🏡 Farm in the City, Live in the Country – An economist’s “brilliant” idea to make cities more sustainable.
🌾 Farmers Don't Matter – A shocking claim that agriculture isn’t key to China’s future.

These aren’t satire—they’re real ideas discussed by top-tier Chinese scholars and economists. How is it possible that these proposals are being taken seriously?

🤔 Is this the future of China’s economic policy?
⚠️ Or is it time to send these "experts" back to the drawing boar
title: 10x Gas Tax & Concubines?! China's 'Experts' Are Out of Control
